mapper.select: select c.car_no, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, m.car_model, m.car_type, m.rental_fee*((to_date(#{returnDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')-to_date(#{rentalDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'))*24*60/10) as rental_price, m.driving_fee, m.car_photo, m.oil_type from car c, car_model_info m where c.car_model=m.car_model and c.ucar_zone_name=#{carVO.uCarZoneVO.uCarZoneName} order by c.car_no

select c.car_no, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, m.car_model, m.car_type, m.rental_fee*((to_date(#{returnDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')-to_date(#{rentalDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'))*24*60/10) as rental_price, m.driving_fee, m.car_photo, m.oil_type from car c, car_model_info m where c.ucar_zone_name=#{carVO.uCarZoneVO.uCarZoneName} and c.car_model=#{carVO.carModelInfoVO.carModel} and c.car_model=m.car_model order by c.car_no

select distinct(car_no) from ( select r.car_no, r.rental_date, r.return_date from car c, sharing_reservation r, sharing_status s where c.ucar_zone_name=#{carVO.uCarZoneVO.uCarZoneName} and c.car_no=r.car_no and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and (s.status='예약' or s.status='이용요금결제' or s.status='이용중' or s.status='연장') ) where to_date(#{rentalDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')<(return_date+numtodsinterval(10,'minute')) and to_date(#{returnDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')>(rental_date-numtodsinterval(10,'minute'))
select UCAR_ZONE_NAME from ucar_zone where UCAR_ZONE_NAME like '%${value}%'
